Name: Alveole
About the game: Alveole is a minimalistic puzzle where the player must understand how to run and why does he do it? Alveole is a short experimental project that explores the possibilities of the player in a restricted environment, where there is only one game mechanic, elevated to the absolute. Playtime: between 15 â€“ 40 minutes.
